GetDeviceDescriptorSets
GetDeviceDescriptorSets

Contains the logic for the Inertial "Get Device Descriptor Sets" command

Constants
Packet Bytes
CMD_ID  = CMD_GET_DESCRIPTOR_SETS

The MipTypes::Command for this command

FIELD_DATA_BYTE  = 0x82

The Data Field Descriptor byte

Functions
buildCommand
static ByteStream buildCommand()

Builds the command packet

Returns

A ByteStream containing the MIP GetDeviceDescriptorSets command packet

const MipDataField &field
) override

Attempts to match an MipDataField to the expected data field response.

parseResponse
void parseResponse(
const GenericMipCmdResponse &response,
std::vector<uint16> &descriptors
) const

Parses a successfully matched response for the GetDeviceDescriptorSets command.

Parameters
response
const GenericMipCmdResponse&

The GenericMipCmdResponse that matches the data field for this response.

The container to insert the descriptors into.
